titles: To his excellencie the Lord Generall Cromwell, and his Honourable Councel of the army at White-Hall. The humble petition of Arise Evans, living in Blackfriers, on the behalf of Gods glorie, the kingdoms behalf, your Honors behalf, and the behalf of the whole world besides.
author: Evans, Arise, b. 1607.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Prophecies --  Early works to 1800.
